name: job_salary
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool job_salary_data.
Tool description: Extremely Fast and Simple API to get Job Salary/Pay Estimations from all major publishers - Payscale, Glassdoor, ZipRecruiter and many others, all in a single API.
API description: Fetch estimated job salaries based on job title and location using the RapidAPI Job Salary API.

job_title.description: The job title for which to get the salary estimation.

location.description: The location or area to search for the job salary estimation.

radius.description: The search radius in kilometers from the location. Defaults to '200'.
